Name: Beat Blocks VR
About the game: A Classic Reinvented Beat Blocks VR is a VR arcade puzzle game in which you have to assemble the blocks and find the best possible combinations to make them disappear. Your goal is simple: beat the high-score and become the best player in the world. Addictive and Interactive Gameplay All the movements are simple , fluid , in order to offer you the most satisfying game possible just with the natural action of your hands. Huge Replayability Beat Blocks VR offers you an infinite experience, each one of your game is unique. You create your own game with your combinations. Game Features 5 stages with their own atmosphere More than 10 different blocks 3 different grids Progressive in-game difficulty Natural control and feeling of the blocks Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
